name: Post Words Counter
author: Shehab Mahamud

sections.description:
Post Words Counter can count the post content words and it shows the counting words an extra column . And this plugin can show the total words count and total characters and post reading time and it also shows this into the post so that post reader also can see this .

Plugin Documentation: https://wordpress.org/plugins/post-words-counter/

sections.installation:
1. Upload post-words-counter to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go Settings page and click words count to set words count option and characters option also reading time option.
sections.faq:
Do I need to setup anything?

No.But if you want to show the post statistics into post page then go the setting page and click word count to set extra features .
